body.en: Computer engineer with a strong focus on performance-aware programming and data-oriented principles. Well experienced in systems programming, server management and DevOps. Passionate about free and open-source software.
body.no: Dataingeniør med fokus på ytelsesbevisst programmering og dataorienterte prinsipper. Erfaren med systemprogrammering, serveradministrasjon og devops.

en: Software development of subsea services and products for operators in the oil and gas industry.
Participation of software development of internal systems for structural analysis of subsea systems.
Help teaching students in the following courses: Introduction to Linux, Computational programming, Digital systems and programming, Object oriented programming.
Making pizzas, cashier work, inventory replenishment.
Making pizzas, cashier work, inventory replenishment.
Factory work, be part of the process of making doors.
no: Programvareutvikling av subsea-tjenester og produkter for operatører i olje- og gassbransjen
Programvareutvikling av interne systemer for strukturell analyse av subsea systemer.
Hjelpelærer for studenter i følgende emner: Introduksjon til Linux, Programmering for beregning, Digitale systemer og programmering, Objekt-orientert programmering.
Fabrikkarbeid, delta i prossessen for å lage dører..

en: Cyber physical systems, focus on hardware-oriented software engineering.
Preparatory math and physics courses for engineering studies.
Supplementary studies qualifying for higher education
High school courses which qualify one for higher education in Norway.
High school with courses related to photography, videography and graphic design.
no: Cyber physical systems, fokus på hardware-orientert programmering.
Forberedende matte- og fysikkfag for ingeniørstudier.
Videregående fag som kvalifiserer en til høyere utdanning.
Videregående fag relatert til fotografi, videografi and grafisk design.

en: My bachelor's project group was awarded the price of the best project of the year at The University of South-Eastern Norway, campus Kongsberg.
no: Min bachelorgruppe fikk utdelt prisen for årets beste prosjekt ved Universitetet i Sørøst-Norge, campus Kongsberg.

en: The Student Democracy in South-Eastern Norway
The main elected student representative for the faculty on campus. Chairs the meetings with the student council and attends the meetings with the campus board and the semester meeting.
The Student Democracy in South-Eastern Norway
Elected representative from the class. Acts as a link between the students in their class and the student council/campus board.
no: Hovedtillitsvalgt på fakultet på campus. Leder møtene mellom de kulltillitsvalgte og deltar på møter i campusstyret og på semestermøtene.
Tillitsvalgt for kullet og fungerer som et bindeledd mellom studentene i kullene og studentrådet/campusstyret.
